alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 2:32PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Essex and northeastern Middlesex Counties through 315 PM EDT... At 231 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westford, or near Chelmsford, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail and wind gusts up to 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Lawrence, Haverhill, Methuen, Billerica, Chelmsford, Andover, Dracut, Tewksbury, North Andover, Westford, Acton, Concord, Amesbury, Tyngsborough, Groton, Littleton, Salisbury, Boxford and Ayer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex
